items.sentence: Tom didn't help Mary wash her car like he promised.
We had a poor harvest because of the lack of water.
I frequently think about my mother who passed away.
I'm glad to have this opportunity to work with you.
The whistle of the steam train woke us at daybreak.
You aren't really going to sing that song, are you?
Tom was still sleeping when Mary rang his doorbell.
This is something that we need to work on together.
I can't wait to see what Tom and Mary have planned.
I won't be giving Tom a birthday present this year.
